attributes.action: Stop supermarkets from selling cut price alcohol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop supermarkets from selling cut price alcohol its killing off all of our public houses who cannot buy the products in at anywhere near as cheap as the supermarkets sell them for our pubs have lost enough trade with the smoke ban.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
